Headline: Purple Line Service Delayed at Davis
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are standing near Davis due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are standing near Davis due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area.  At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
